label: Population
Note: Country residents regardless of legal status or citizenship

label: GDP
Note: Dollar figures are converted from domestic currencies using single year official exchange rates

label: English spoken in country
Note: Any country where English is widely spoken, even if not official language

label: PubCrawler publication bias index
Note: Estimated relative reporting effort in each country based on location mentions in PubMed Central Open Access Subset (PMCOAS)

label: Health expenditure
Source: World Health Organization via World Bank
Note: Healthcare goods and services consumed during each year.

label: Antibiotic exports
Note: Data comes from the United Nations Statistical Division (COMTRADE)

label: Antibiotic imports1
Note: Data comes from the United Nations Statistical Division (COMTRADE)

label: Migrant population
Source: United Nations Population Division via World Bank
Note: Number of people born in a country other than that in which they live, including refugees.

label: Tourism (inbound)
Note: Data compiled from administrative records and/or border surveys

label: Tourism (outbound)
Note: Data compiled from administrative records and/or border surveys

label: Livestock antibiotic consumption
Note: Country-reported antibiotic sales for cattle, chickens, pigs
